name: Ink Travellers - Present Hunt
description:
Ink Travellers was originally made for the Indie Game Making Contest 2015.
This new version has completely remade graphics, many stuff is finally fixed, the battles are completely rebalanced, there are two completely new levels to explore and a new gameplay mechanic to use. There are also some new easter eggs and more small details.

More Stuff

For more news and updates check my Patreon. (Most Update Posts will become publicly available after some time. ;) )
